bioconda.name: kmc
bioconda.summary: Tools for efficient k-mer counting and filtering of reads based on k-mer content.

biocontainers.name: kmc
biocontainers.summary: Kmc is a utility designed for counting k-mers (sequences of consecutive k symbols) in a set of reads from genome sequencing projects.

biotools.summary: KMC is a utility designed for counting k-mers (sequences of consecutive k symbols) in a set of reads from genome sequencing projects.

bioschemas.name: KMC
bioschemas.summary: KMC is a utility designed for counting k-mers (sequences of consecutive k symbols) in a set of reads from genome sequencing projects.
